bibl.title: The Cairo Codex of Menander . A photographic edition prepared under the supervision of H. Riad and Abd el-Kadr Selim.
bibl.seg: Koenen Ludwig, The Cairo Codex of Menander (P. Cair. J. 43227). A photographic edition prepared under the supervision of H. Riad and Abd el-Kadr Selim.
University of London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1978, in fol., [xi] pp. et LIV pll.

C.R. par Pedro Bádenas de la Peña, Emerita 51 (1983) pp. 147-148. - J. Bingen, ChrEg 53 (1978) No. 106, p. 378. - D. Del Corno, RivFC 109 (1981) pp. 353-354. - P.G. McC. Brown, CR N.S., 33 (1983) pp. 180-184 (concerne aussi W. Geoffrey Arnott, Menander. I. Aspis to Epitrepontes. Cambridge, Mass. - London, 1979). - A. Nogara, Aegyptus 61 (1981) p. 289.
